column4: hey, is there any way to dualboot ubuntu desktop and ubuntu server?
pici: ok? does that mean i cant dual boot them?
you can host your game server at the same time as running the desktop, all with the same single Ubuntu install.
but i dont want desktop lagging the server. it uses resources
you can only boot one instance of Ubuntu at a time. Yes, you could install both server and Desktop on different partitions but you would only be able to boot to one of those and use it.
